generalMsg:
Damn it, newbie! There has been a security breach. The enemy managed to hack our system and insert malicious code in our aiming software. There must be a traitor among us...
Anyway. You're the only one who understands anything about this stuff... fix it NOW!

soldierMsg.1: The playerShoot(x,y) function is called when our soldiers click on a missile target (x and y are the coordinates of the target, and the destination of the missile).
soldierMsg.2: Hmm.. It's as if they added an offset to the target coordinates... Pranksters!
